verificationNotes: ✅ NSW FHBAS: Verified correct (exemption $800K, concessional to $1M for new/existing; vacant land exempt $350K, concessional to $450K)
✅ NSW FHOG: Verified correct ($10K grant, new homes max $600K, land+build max $750K) - URL was updated from /new-homes to /first-home-owner-new-homes-grant
✅ VIC Duty Concession: Verified correct (exemption up to $600K, concessional $600K-$750K)
✅ VIC FHOG: Verified correct ($10K grant, max $750K for new homes only)
✅ QLD First Home Concession: Verified correct (no duty under $700K, concessional $700K-$800K) - Last updated May 1, 2025
⚠️ QLD FHOG: NEEDS UPDATE - Two grant amounts exist: $30K (contracts 20 Nov 2023 to 30 Jun 2026) OR $15K (contracts before 20 Nov 2023). Current implementation only shows $30K.
✅ LMI Rates: Verified correct as of April 9, 2025 - all premium rates match reference table
⚠️ FHDS: Homepage verified to exist but detailed price caps not prominently displayed - implementation based on official documentation from October 2025
